vivae.ros.simulator.engine.demo.keycontrolled

Class KeyControlledVivaeSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • vivae.ros.simulator.engine.demo.keycontrolled.KeyControlledVivaeSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulation, ExternalSimulation

    public class KeyControlledVivaeSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Simulation
    This starts the simulation with one manually controlled agent (0), the rest two with random weights. Does not use ROS.
